MajorClaims.MC1: governments should help and encourage artists to continue their work

Claims.C1: art is a very valuable object for every country and the talent in this area cannot be discovered everywhere
Claims.C3: culture and history of a country can be reserved and assured by art
Claims.C4: talent in art is extremely precious and should not be wasted

Premises.P1: art helps to improve the quality of our lives as well as attracting tourists
Premises.P2: monuments that represent each city do not only illustrate the city's history and culture, but also make the city more beautiful and an attractive place for tourists
Premises.P3: some countries depend on tourism as their main source of revenue
Premises.P4: their work crafts are very necessary to boost the tourist industry
Premises.P5: sculptures and paintings in the museums and art galleries generally reflect the culture and civilization of every generation
Premises.P6: Young people are also able to get more knowledge about their country's history and culture by observing various work crafts
Premises.P7: not many people are blessed in the talent of paintings and work crafts
Premises.P8: this type of talent has to be valued as other types of talents such as talent in science or literature
